message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $130, but I'm open to negotiation.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I can only pay up to $100 for it.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $100 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $115. This is still a good price for you considering the value of the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'd like to offer $105 for the product.
